p: Skin pigmentation represents one of the most notable physical traits in humans, thus any alteration, as in the case of hypopigmentation can cause significant emotional and psychological distress and reduced quality of life [ 3]. Hypopigmentation disorders are usually treated with topical creams or oral medication to restore skin color but most of these treatments have unwanted side effects [ 20]. Thus, the discovery of a safe product that can promote melanin production and also possesses antioxidant properties is of a great interest. Within this context, the antioxidant activities of ALE and its melanogenesis effect on B16 melanoma cells were evaluated.
